mehi artha nirupanaye lath pragamanayan nam ekama pataya prabheda thrithwayak lesa dakwa athi bawa wataha ganima (1799); widesha namayan uchcharanayata podu jana wahare di shabda widyathmaka sanketha bhawitha wi athi bawa (1802); rupakshara pela ehi wu podu jana waharata yam samanathwayak dakwana bawa (thomas yang, 1814) saha widesha namwalata amatharawa swadeshika eejipthu wachana uchcharanayata da shabda widyathmaka sanketha bhawitha kara athi bawa (champoliyan, 1822–1824) wataha ganimayi.

me athara ada dinaye labena nawa panduwen niwaradi sthanawalata pandu yawamin dakunu aprikanu kadulu dawaganimata salasum karana bawa thun iriyaw kridaka dasun shanaka prakasha kala.me athara eeye dinayedi aabadhayakata lakwu wega pandu yawana kridaka kasun rajithata mema tharangawaliya ahimi wi yana bawa krikat aaranchi marga pawasanawa.wega pandu yawana kridaka kasun rajitha saha dhananjaya da silwa aabadhawalata lakwima sambandhayen adahas dakwu dasun shanaka pawasa sitiye ohuge dayakathwaya kandayamata nolabi yama wishala paduwak bawayi.

thora ganna samata nomile natya wadamuluwak da pawathwe.wasantha namaskarage ‘manawa rupaye abhyantharaya’ nam ekasiya ata wani drushya kala pradarshanaya mema masa 15 wanida sita 30 wanida dakwa mahanuwara ampitiya jemsan jathyanthara bauddha bhawana madhyasthanaye shri sambuddha jayanthi drushya kalagarayedi pawathwe.palitha jayakodige aluthma pariwarthana granthaya ‘bala wiyaruwa‘ mema masa 21 wanida angaharuwada maradana dayawansha jayakodi saha samagamaye nawa poth pradarshanagarayedi dorata wadi.thalatha widanagamage liyu ‘diyaniya’ nam aluthma nawakathawa pasugiyada dorata wadina.samaja asadharanayan abhimuwa diriyen nangi sitinna wu yuwathiyakage jayagrahanaye salakuna kathuwariya ‘diyaniya’ kruthiyen patakayata gena hara payi.thilani shanika withanachchi
mema sakachchawa sandaha nithipathi, maha banku adhipathi, allas ho dushana chodana wimarshana komishan sabhawe adhyaksha jenaral athulu niladharin pirisak ek wa sitiyaha.
owun jiwathwela thibune daruweku lesa thamanta himiwiya yuthu hama deyakma ahimi wechchi parisarayakayi.
mama nugath kamkaruwek.
shikshana padayen kiyawena widihata natum, gayum yanadiya wisuka dassaka yanuwen nam kara bhikshunta thahanam kirimak siduwa thibenawa.
anek karuna nam aalepanayak aluthin thora ganimedi apa ee gana parikshakari wiya yuthuya.
"doni baya wenne mokatada?"
kisi witeka minisun warga kota dakime puruddak ohuta nothibini.
